snippet: The Rhodes Trust confirmed that it had put on hold the candidacy of the quarterback, Patrick J. Witt, upon learning that a fellow student had filed a complaint against him.
abstract: Rhodes Trust confirms that it had put on hold the candidacy of Yale quarterback Patrick J Witt upon learning that a fellow student had filed a complaint against him.
lead_paragraph: The Rhodes Trust confirmed that it had put on hold the candidacy of the quarterback, Patrick J. Witt, upon learning that a fellow student had filed a complaint against him.

headline.seo: Rhodes Trust Gives Account of Quarterback’s Candidacy
